name: SF Mobile Crisis Team
description: San Francisco's Mobile Crisis Team provides on-site mental health crisis intervention as an alternative to police response, sending trained clinicians to help people experiencing psychiatric emergencies.
fullDescription: San Francisco's Mobile Crisis Team provides on-site mental health crisis intervention as an alternative to police response, sending trained clinicians to help people experiencing psychiatric emergencies.
whatTheyOffer:
- On-site crisis intervention
- Mental health assessment
- De-escalation support
- Connection to appropriate services
- Alternative to law enforcement response
howToGetIt: Call 415-970-4000 to request a mobile crisis team response. Available for mental health emergencies in San Francisco.
keywords: SF Mobile Crisis Team, psychiatric emergency, mental health emergency, crisis intervention, clinicians, alternative to police
